Class ScrollActor

  • java.lang.Object
    • greenfoot.Actor
      • ScrollActor
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    Block, BlockBuilder, BlockHB, CheckPoint, Player
    public abstract class ScrollActor
extends greenfoot.Actor
    An actor in a ScrollWorld. Will move with camera if isCameraFollower is true. Will follow the background if isCameraFollower is false. Actors that are not subclasses of this class will follow the camera.
